direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle parameter and value, but 'match' determines if the handler can handle the value, while 'apply' performs the actual conversion.
The 'apply' method internally uses 'Enum.valueOf' to convert the string to an enum, suggesting that test cases for 'apply' can be enhanced by considering 'Enum.valueOf' scenarios.
The 'apply' method uses 'asSubclass' to ensure the parameter is an enum, indicating similar type-checking logic that can be tested together.
